name: Labyrinth (itch) (FeliParamoico, NarilGVB)
description:
How to play:

Use WASD or the arrows to move along the labyrinth to escape!! But you will need a friend to help you avoinding the traps. Your friend will have to guide you seeking which is the right way in the pdf manual: North, South, East or West.

        

TEAM

Game Design & Programming - Irene Alvarado

2D artist & Concept artist - Felipe Cabezon

3D artist & Vfx artist - Paula Chicote

3D artist & animator - Javier G Merida

Remember: Use Ctrl+ F to fullscreen!!The .PDF is the guide for player 2.(Only in spanish sorry D:)
